articles.title: BMI, Waist Circumference Linked to Lung Function Decline in Pre- and Postmenopausal Women - AJMC.com Managed Markets Network
articles.description: Previous research has shown the health effects of obesity, including the decline in lung function. New research highlights obesity is a risk factor for asthma and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease in premenopausal and postmenopausal women.
